lines.text: He's always cool with me, easy goin'. Always shot a good clean weld, you know, no rough seams. Sometimes certain folks in management would ride his ass pretty hard, and Hampton would always say, "he does this or says that one more time, I'm walkin' outa here".

Well he said that kinda shit every day, ya know. It's like getting real mad at someone and saying, some day I'm gonna kill that some of a bitch. Everybody says that shit, ya don't go and kill the person
If I knew then what I know now, I woulda never given him that postcard.
He sent uh, me sent me this from prison. He calls is Calamity Jane. But I don't know what to make of it.
